forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 24. West wind 2 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 3pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 45. South southwest wind 3 to 10 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 11pm, then rain and snow. Cloudy. Low around 32, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. Southeast wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
